analysis.narrative:

Conviction is MEDIUMâ€”sources agree on upside potential but highlight material downside risks that remain unpriced.

key_themes: Fed rate-cut expectations and monetary easing narrative
AI productivity tailwinds vs. enterprise software margin pressure
Safe-haven precious metals demand signaling macro uncertainty
Treasury market dysfunction and systemic stress
Consumer demand destruction despite retail headline strength
risk_factors: Treasury delivery fails at 8-year highs signal financial system stress
Corporate guidance cuts cascading through software and financial services could break bullish narrative
Geopolitical escalation (Iran, Taiwan, Russia-Ukraine) creating unpriced tail risk
Precious metals mean reversion if macro sentiment shifts, potentially liquidating leveraged positions
Homebuyer activity and trade volumes declining materially, signaling demand destruction that could pressure equities
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Test resistance at $700 call wall (active hedging). Hold above $690 support. Break below $670 (45k OI) would signal intraday weakness toward $640 put wall. QQQ: Resistance at $630 call wall (active) and $625 (active, 29k OI). Support at $590 put wall if $620-$625 range breaks. Watch for volatility near max pain levels ($686 SPY, $621 QQQ).
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Primary support at $670 (active), secondary at $640 put wall. Resistance $700 (call wall, active), $750 (dormant). Swing traders favor long above $670 with target toward $750 if call wall breaks. QQQ: Support $590 put wall. Resistance $630-$640 zone (active). Bullish swing setup if $625 holds. Watch for mean reversion in precious metals to reset risk appetite and rotate capital back to equities.

regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
